display_long_description:
ZOSU Ocean:
- 30 Ocean VR levels to explore, more of a relaxing experience than a game
- Over 100 sea animals to save, the majority are randomly spawned
- Over 60 minutes of timed gameplay in scoring mode
- This is a relaxing game where you are ZOSU the explorer and you are collecting sea creatures to save them from extinction and to score points

Major September 2024 update:
- new mixed reality area to toggle through ocean animals to copy and grab them, with optional hand tracking
- bonus lobby area with table top land animals to hold
- bonus turtle specific mixed reality area
- performance and bug fixes

Controls:
- Built-in right hand jetpack for movement. Jetpack body movement is set to the direction of your hand.
- Walking and jumping movement is set to the direction you are looking.
- Score points by collecting fish and finding randomly spawned treasure.

Gameplay:
- Timed scoring mode, 2 minutes per level with over 60 minutes of gameplay
- Freeplay mode, no timer and no scoring
- This is intended to be a relaxing game and there is no way to take damage or die
- Sea creatures include starfish, dinosaurs, sharks, squid, many many common and exotic fish, and large sea mammals
- Bonus island land lobby with climbing and level selection lobby
